short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion app that makes it easy to see activity related to the FundU system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion app to be used alongside FundU to quickly search for activity related to contacts such as emails sent and replied to
